item_category: The space-saving Vivo AiO 24 is remarkably slim and light and with a NanoEdge display which features an impossibly thin bezel for edge-to-edge viewing and an impressive 88% screen-to-body ratio. This stunning 23.8-inch widescreen display includes wide-view technology that makes it perfect for sharing pictures or videos with friends and family. With Full HD (1920 x 1080) resolution, you'll enjoy games and movies in vivid detail, with amazing colour and contrast.
review_text: Very good computer does everything I need and so fast wish I gone for the touch screen but I can't complain I'm very happy
